alert.note: Alert for Bland; Giles (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 29 at 3:11PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding continues along Wolf Creek, as well as along creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations feeding into Wolf Creek due to heavy runoff from 3 to locally 4 inches of rainfall earlier today. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Virginia, including the following counties, Bland and Giles. * WHEN...Until 600 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Multiple roads, including Old Wolf Creek Road, may be flooded with several feet of water or covered with debris and impassible. Homes near the town of Narrows may be surrounded and cut off by flood waters, and may be inaccessible until these waters recede. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 304 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported that a few roads threatened by flooding along Wolf Creek. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Narrows, Rocky Gap and Chapel. - For flooding safety information, please visit http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. When it is safe to do so, please send your reports of flooding, including mudslides or flooded roads, to the National Weather Service by calling toll free at 1...8 6 6...2 1 5...4 3 2 4. Reports and pictures can also be shared on the National Weather Service Blacksburg Facebook page and on Twitter.
